Package hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix

This package provides interfaces for matrices and vectors, as well as a factory class for creating instances.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Matrix
    A matrix of double values.
    Matrix2
    A 3x3 matrix.
    Matrix3
    A 3x3 matrix.
    SingularValueDecomposition
    The singular value decomposition of a matrix.
    Vector
    A column vector.
    Vector2
    A 2D column vector.
    Vector3
    A 3D column vector.
    Vector4
    A 4D column vector.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MatrixFactory
    Factory class for creating matrix instances.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SingularityException
    Thrown when an operation cannot be performed because of a singular matrix.

Package hu.kazocsaba.math.matrix Description

This package provides interfaces for matrices and vectors, as well as a factory class for creating instances. Strong typing is enforced on the instances, meaning that if a Matrix instance has a single column, it will in fact be a Vector instance, and if it also has 2, 3, or 4 rows, it will implement Vector2, Vector3, or Vector4, respectively. Furthermore, a 2x2 and a 3x3 matrix will always have the type Matrix2 and Matrix3, respectively.

Of course this kind of type-safety is guaranteed only for instances produced by this module, and cannot be enforced for an arbitrary implementation.
